Author: HadeToken
Title: [ANN] B2C Payment Processor for Cryptocurrencies and Fiat | HPAY Coin ICO |
Body: |HPay|Hade Pay|Whitepaper|Reddit|Telegram|Twitter|Facebook| https://hadeplatform.com/hpay/images/hadepaycoin.png Our mission is to build a stronger foundation for cryptocurrency with Hade Pay by disrupting a worldwide B2C online payments industry with an expected $5.7 trillion in annual spending by 2021. Hade Pay is a market-ready product that has been tested and will deploy worldwide starting in July. HPAY Coin and Hade Pay have created the first and only viable solution for business-to-consumer and business-to-business fiat and cryptocurrency payments.  HPAY Fund from June 24, 2018 until June 30, 2018  https://www.coinschedule.com/link-to-us/logo/2870?type=1  https://i.imgur.com/OJ7pNWs.png  50,000,000 HPAY Coins have already been sold. We are offering 12,000,000 additional Hade Pay Coins at 6 cents to create an exchange fund. All of the funds in this offering will be used to list HPAY on cryptocurrency exchanges to maximize exposure for Hade Pay, Verifie, and MatriX.   What is Hade Pay Coin (HPAY) HPAY is a currency option for consumers to make online purchases with Hade Pay Merchants can reduce their transaction costs from 1.5% to 0.5% by holding HPAY to cover fees. Each merchant can verify 5 wallet addresses on the Verifie private blockchain. You can verify additional wallet addresses with HPAY. You can buy any product or service offered by any merchant that uses Hade Pay and accepts HPAY  Coin INFO SYMBOL : HPAY DECIMALS : 18 TOTAL SUPPLY : 75,000,000 HPAY CONTRACT ADDRESS : 0x0854dcbdcd026c0b534b09608adb3f2bf6baacd0  Please Read the Following Exchange Fund Offering TERMS 12,000,000 HPAY will be sold at a fixed rate of 6 cents until the end of June 100% of the funds raised will be used to list HPAY on top 20 cryptocurrency exchanges by volume The total HPAY supply of 75,000,000 will not change Exchange Fund participants and contributors of Round 1 will receive HPAY at the end of June Hade Pay will be used to facilitate the exchange fund offering All participants must purchase a minimum of 1,000 HPAY   HPAY Team https://i.imgur.com/PxUI1Jl.jpg See here for LinkedIn profiles and descriptions  Advisors https://i.imgur.com/hSL13Hb.png See here for LinkedIn profiles and descriptions  |HPay|Hade Pay|Whitepaper|Reddit|Telegram|Twitter|Facebook|
